Package model

Class Commons

java.lang.Object
model.Commons
public final class Commons extends Object
Hosts pretty common used objects and methods code to not repeat them and avoid boilerplate code as well as the code atomicity principle
Since:
1.5

      public static Commons getAdm()
      Gets the unique instance of this class, following Singleton Desing Pattern in Development
      Returns:

    • getFormatoDateTime

      public static DateTimeFormatter getFormatoDateTime(Commons.TypeFormatoDateTime tipoFormato)
      Gets the respective DateTimeFormatter object with the proper formatter string set, following a given enum constant indicator, to make formats over other objects related with dates or time
      Parameters:
      tipoFormato - A specified format enum indicator to set properly the formatter and return in consequence the right formatter set
      Returns:
      The DateTimeFormatter object with the proper format set
